name: Frog Corral
description:
Frog Corral

A cozy puzzle game about bringing frogs back to water.

Group frogs together to help them find their way. All the while encountering gates, snails, songs, a missing tadpole, and yet more frogs! And yes, the frogs STACK.

Pour a cup of tea, grab a blanket, and relax. Enjoy these 10 concise levels, and a couple surprises :)

Controls

Mouse: click and drag to guide the frogs.
